verbs.description: [ARG0: state prisons] [V: resume] [ARG1: normal operations] [ARGM-TMP: after 12-day lockdown] [ARGM-ADV: normal operations resumed monday at all state prisons after a 12-day lockdown prompted by drug exposures that sickened multiple employees and inmates according to the department of corrections tom wolfe john wetzel harrisburg pennsylvania department of corrections]

state prisons resume normal operations after [ARGM-TMP: 12-day] [V: lockdown] normal operations resumed monday at all state prisons after a 12-day lockdown prompted by drug exposures that sickened multiple employees and inmates according to the department of corrections tom wolfe john wetzel harrisburg pennsylvania department of corrections
